value:
This realm has a beauty so different
from my own Hoshido. I would like to
show it to all my siblings someday.

My retainers are Kagero and Saizo.
I am fortunate to have such loyal and
meticulous people in my service.

You're always so diligent. Remember
to rely on your allies for strength.
And I say, think of me as a brother.

I wish we could spar with our divine
weapons. But I am aware that my
Raijinto is not like yours at all.$k$pI must admit, I find it a troubling
concept that your weapon
discharges...Heroes.

I advise you to meditate each day,
$Nu.$k$pIt quells bad thoughts and promotes
the best ones.

Ah! You must be
$Nu.$k$pI bring greetings from a
friend, $Nf.

I take no pride from such gains.
It is my duty.

Adequate, but I must strive for
more.

I must redouble my efforts and
do better.

I will always give you my all,
no matter what my power.

I am Ryoma, High Prince of Hoshido,
and he who inherited Raijinto. I will
give my all, however dire the times.

Care to join me for some meditation?
Then close your eyes. Empty your
mind. Envision a relaxing place.$k$pI am thinking of Hoshido—cherry-
blossom trees in bloom...rain in the
gardens...a moon on the wane.$k$pI must admit that when I've been
meditating of late, I have also
envisioned something new.$k$pPlaces from this realm...the faces
of members in the Order of
Heroes...and, most of all...$k$pI see you, standing on the battlefield.
That image lets me achieve inner
balance like no other.$k$pI hope that you would feel just the
same from my presence here.$k$pOne more thing—in my own kingdom,
I would never pledge my katana
in service to another.$k$pBut here, it is my honor and my
privilege to serve you to the
end with my blade.
ふんっ
でやあっ！
うわっ！
I can keep going!
You have breathed your last.
You deserve worse.
We stand together.
May your blood crust my blade!
Counting on you...
Hmm...
Should you ever need to converse, remember, I am here for you.
I will follow your orders, for as long as I'm here.
I fight only to put an end to fighting. And war, to end all wars.
I feel as if I could learn much from the prince of this realm.
I see you're taking notice of my armor. Do you find it...unusual?
I never know when Saizo and Kagero are with me. Perhaps they're here now.
No matter which Heroes you take into battle, remember to be a commanding presence.
Yes?
Tell me.
Let's go.
